title: The myth of poisoned pets
subtitle: The cat showed up dead after eating at the dinner party and the guests rushed to the hospital. Oh, yeah?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The cat who helped himself with the salmon is preparing for a dinner party later. The host, scared of her poisoned dish, convinces her guests to rush to the hospital and get her stomach pumped. Later that evening, a neighbor came to apologize for ransacking the cat.
